scripts.dev-llm: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n OLLAMA,VITE,FLASK -c gray,yellow,blue "ollama serve" "vite build --watch" "sleep 2 && OLLAMA_MODEL=${OLLAMA_MODEL:-mistral} python3.11 run.py"
scripts.start-ollama: npm run stop-ollama && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n OLLAMA-SERVE,OLLAMA-RUN -c gray,magenta "ollama serve" "sleep 2 && ollama run llama3"
scripts.stop-ollama: pkill -f 'ollama run' || true && pkill -f 'ollama serve' || true
